name: SWORDLINE VR - FATEC Alpha 0.2
description:
Please, support our game to help us develop it and finish the project

We expect to improve in many ways.

This project is an alpha public version and may contain a few bugs, as well as it is not the same product as the "Swordline VR" (the unreleased final version)

You can't distribute the game with monetary intentions

Made By:

CARLOS AUGUSTO RODRIGUES (Main Dev. & Game Designer)

NICOLAS MARTINS DOS SANTOS (Main Artist & Game Designer)

VICTOR HUGO BARROS FERNANDO (Artist & Game Designer)

VINICIUS REZENDE COSTA (Designer)
